name: OSSignpostIntervalState
desc: An object that tracks the state of a signposted interval.

items.name: init(from: Decoder)
items.desc: Decodes the interval state from the provided decoder.

items.name: static func beginState(id: OSSignpostID) -> OSSignpostIntervalState
items.desc: Recreates interval state from the specified signpost ID.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes the interval state into the provided encoder.
